Server.Name: True Survival A21.1
Server.Description: True Survival 21.1 Test build #1.16 ----------------------------------- Required SP/Coop Game Settings -RWG Maps only -World Size = 8192x8192 (or bigger) -Difficulty = Adventurer -24Hr Cycle = 60-90min -Day light length = 18 -Zombie Day Speed = Walk -Zombie Night Speed = Jog -Zombie Feral Speed = Run -Zombie Bloodmoon Speed = Sprint -XP Multiplier = 100% -Loot Abundance = 100% -Block Damages - 100% -Loot Respawn Timer = Disabled -Drop all on death -Bloodmoon Count = 64 (or as much as your PC can take)
